    P

    PolicyEnforcerTest - Class in kp.resource.server.controllers

    PolicyEnforcerTest() - Constructor for class kp.resource.server.controllers.PolicyEnforcerTest
     

    S

    shouldGetDocument(String, String) - Method in class kp.resource.server.controllers.PolicyEnforcerTest
    Verifies that authorized users with the correct role can successfully access the specified document endpoint and return an HTTP 200 (OK) response, as well as the correct document content in the response body.
    shouldNotGetDocument(String, String) - Method in class kp.resource.server.controllers.PolicyEnforcerTest
    Verifies that authorized users without the correct role cannot access the specified document endpoint and return an HTTP 403 (Forbidden) response.
    shouldNotGetDocumentWhenUnauthenticated(String) - Method in class kp.resource.server.controllers.PolicyEnforcerTest
    Verifies that unauthenticated users cannot access any document endpoint and return an HTTP 401 (Unauthorized) response.
